title: Sharing space
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Milton Ingerson and Brian Bergin
brief_description: Pilot projects by the South Australian Housing Trust into medium density housing based on the Radburn Principle. Special emphasis is placed on a major community of this type included in the massive West Lakes development.
